attributes.action: disband Torbay Council and replace it with a greater Devon County Council
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Torbay council has failed the residents and taxpayers of Torbay with an ongoing list of failings and poor performance, including, but not limited to:

- Rock Walk closure
- Sea front closures
- Torquay town centre shops empty
- Paignton town centre shops empty
- Parking metres
- The balloon
- The missing CDs
- Selling off green spaces
- Oldway mansion
- Failing to invest and improve the bay
- Falling standards of living

Torbay Council has been run by various political parties but has continued to fail the residents and taxpayers of the bay.
